remarks: A lattice plane cannot majorize a lattice volume.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lvolnlelpln.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lvolnlelpln.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lvolnlelpln.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
lvolnlelpln $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. V /\ Y e. P ) -> -. X .<_ Y ) $.
